about_the_game:
Celestarium

A game about exploration and exploitation at every possible level. A futuristic astronomy game set in an alternate reality where you start as an amateur astronomer whose goal is to observe space and look out for planets.

Explore



Observe space from your high tech space station using an old telescope of yours. As you explore and discover various celestial objects, sell their data to corporates to earn money. You may use money to acquire better gear, such as more professional telescopes, which accelerate your exploration efforts even more.

Discover



Discover anything in the cosmos ranging from the smallest asteroids and dwarf planets to giant stars, supermassive blackholes and far away galaxies.

Expand



Start your own space agency and conduct astronomy missions. Hire and lead many astronomers, researchers and engineers to expand your presence in the industry. Manage the assets of your very own agency and play the game of high risks and high gains.

Prosper



Venture into aerospace business, build rockets from scratch and fly them to the planets you've discovered. Deploy a ton of satellites or probes, attempt landings and even start colonies. The universe of Celestarium has opened it's gates for you to prosper.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any modern OS package
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 or AMD A4-4000 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics should work without problem, provided the drivers are up to date
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Must be able to open 3 chrome tabs at once
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any release titled as "macOS", warranty void if ran on the old "OSX" family
  • Processor: Any 2009 model processor (2009 macs usually come with Intel Core 2 Duo)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics will work
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: One of the devs made this game using a MacBook Pro 2015 so anything in the range or better than that should run good.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Latest Stable Version
  • Processor: Any built-in Intel processor in post-2015 macs are recommended. Apple's ARM processors might work but are not officially supported
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics are recommended
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Celestarium, an astronomy game where you start as an amateur astronomer. Discover and map planets, sell data to corporates, improve your gear, start your own space agency, manage your own missions, build and fly rockets to discovered bodies. Explore, prosper and expand your presence in space.
